definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
book or record/registry/roll/place of one's family or ancestral records/membership

sentences.english: Hangui is the priest of the Pumi nationality.
sentences.chinese: 韓規古籍是普米族祭司韓規使用的宗教典籍。

sentences.english: This ancient Islamic religious text has sold over 800 million copies.
sentences.chinese: 這本古老的伊斯蘭教教義典籍已售出8億本。

sentences.english: Hanlin Academy was the administration for the books collection in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 明代對此有所因革，朝廷典藏改由翰林典籍管理。

sentences.english: A number of ancient books ever recorded the "leaf whistling" technique.
sentences.chinese: 關於“木葉”藝術，古代典籍多所記載。

sentences.english: Through repair work or the preparation of literature books, play down the sense of Han nationality.
sentences.chinese: 通過重修或編寫文獻典籍，淡化漢民族意識。

sentences.english: Moreover, the economic thoughts of Guanzi make this collection unique among all classical Chinese documents.
sentences.chinese: 《管子》的經濟思想又使得它在古代典籍中獨樹一幟。

sentences.english: There were a lot of betel pepper juice accounts in the ancient culture.
sentences.chinese: 對“蒟醬”的記載見於多種古代典籍。

sentences.english: Sell products in the book business card printing and membership card making markets more seasonal.
sentences.chinese: 不邊銷典籍制卡和會員卡制息闤闠季節性比力不強。

sentences.english: According to ancient books, Jade Gui can be used in various occasions.
sentences.chinese: 從古代典籍中可以看出，玉圭的用法是多樣的。

sentences.english: The collections included not only sutras, but also almost every kind of publication.
sentences.chinese: 所藏不一定都是佛經，所有的典籍它統統都收集。

sentences.english: There are many ancient codes and records in the library of our institute.
sentences.chinese: 在我院圖書館裏藏有許多典籍。

sentences.english: Classic of Mountains and Rivers is an ancient writing coming down for more than two thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 《山海經》是一部流傳了兩千餘年的上古時期的典籍。

sentences.english: Yili was an important book of Confucianism.
《Yun Ji Qi Jian》is an important ancient book for the Taoism culture research.
sentences.chinese: 《雲笈七箋》是道教文化研究的重要典籍。

sentences.english: To re-discover many lost classical documents.
sentences.chinese: 再現了許多已失傳的典籍。

sentences.english: This electronic library contains a great number of ancient Chinese books.
sentences.chinese: 這個電子書庫收錄了大量的中國古代典籍。

definition: the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
